SummonerBarrier.name: Barrier
SummonerBarrier.description: Shields your champion from 115-455 damage (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.
SummonerBarrier.sanitizedDescription: Shields your champion from 115-455 damage (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.
SummonerBarrier.tooltip: Temporarily shields {{ f1 }} damage from your champion for 2 seconds.
SummonerBarrier.sanitizedTooltip: Temporarily shields {{ f1 }} damage from your champion for 2 seconds.

SummonerPoroRecall.name: To the King!
SummonerPoroRecall.description: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.
SummonerPoroRecall.sanitizedDescription: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.
SummonerPoroRecall.tooltip:
Passive: Hitting an enemy champion with a Poro gives your team a Poro Mark. Upon reaching 10 Poro Marks, your team summons the Poro King to fight alongside them. While the Poro King is active, no Poro Marks can be scored by either team.

Active: Quickly dash to King Poro's side. Can only be cast while the Poro King is summoned for your team.

''Poros tug the heartstrings. The rest of you just comes along for the ride.''
SummonerPoroRecall.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Hitting an enemy champion with a Poro gives your team a Poro Mark. Upon reaching 10 Poro Marks, your team summons the Poro King to fight alongside them. While the Poro King is active, no Poro Marks can be scored by either team. Active: Quickly dash to King Poro's side. Can only be cast while the Poro King is summoned for your team. ''Poros tug the heartstrings. The rest of you just comes along for the ride.''

SummonerSnowURFSnowball_Mark.name: Ultra (Rapidly Flung) Mark
SummonerSnowURFSnowball_Mark.description: It's a snowball! It's a Poro! It's...uh...one of those.
SummonerSnowURFSnowball_Mark.sanitizedDescription: It's a snowball! It's a Poro! It's...uh...one of those.
SummonerSnowURFSnowball_Mark.tooltip:
Throw a snowball approximately 1 Really Far units away, dealing {{ f1 }} true damage to the first enemy unit hit and granting True Sight of the target.

If your Ultra Mark hits an enemy, this ability can be recast for {{ e3 }} seconds to Dash to the tagged unit, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} true damage and increasing your swagger by like a million percent.

If you have Poros following you, you throw a Poro instead of a Snowball, because we're terrible people.
SummonerSnowURFSnowball_Mark.sanitizedTooltip: Throw a snowball approximately 1 Really Far units away, dealing {{ f1 }} true damage to the first enemy unit hit and granting True Sight of the target. If your Ultra Mark hits an enemy, this ability can be recast for {{ e3 }} seconds to Dash to the tagged unit, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} true damage and increasing your swagger by like a million percent. If you have Poros following you, you throw a Poro instead of a Snowball, because we're terrible people.

SummonerBoost.name: Cleanse
SummonerBoost.description: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.
SummonerBoost.sanitizedDescription: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.
SummonerBoost.tooltip: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and reduces the duration of disables by 65% for the next {{ f1 }} seconds.
SummonerBoost.sanitizedTooltip: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and reduces the duration of disables by 65% for the next {{ f1 }} seconds.

SummonerDarkStarChampSelect2.name: Disabled Summoner Spells
SummonerDarkStarChampSelect2.description: Summoner spells are disabled in this mode.
SummonerDarkStarChampSelect2.sanitizedDescription: Summoner spells are disabled in this mode.

SummonerTeleport.name: Teleport
SummonerTeleport.description: After channeling for 4.5 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied structure, minion, or ward.
SummonerTeleport.sanitizedDescription: After channeling for 4.5 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied structure, minion, or ward.
SummonerTeleport.tooltip:
After channeling for {{ f1 }} seconds, your champion teleports to target allied structure, minion, or ward.

You may reactivate Teleport to cancel it, placing it on a {{ f3 }} second cooldown.
SummonerTeleport.sanitizedTooltip: After channeling for {{ f1 }} seconds, your champion teleports to target allied structure, minion, or ward. You may reactivate Teleport to cancel it, placing it on a {{ f3 }} second cooldown.

SummonerDarkStarChampSelect1.name: Disabled Summoner Spells
SummonerDarkStarChampSelect1.description: Summoner spells are disabled in this mode.
SummonerDarkStarChampSelect1.sanitizedDescription: Summoner spells are disabled in this mode.

SummonerFlash.name: Flash
SummonerFlash.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
SummonerFlash.sanitizedDescription: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
SummonerFlash.tooltip: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
SummonerFlash.sanitizedTooltip: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

SummonerSnowball.name: Mark
SummonerSnowball.description: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.
SummonerSnowball.sanitizedDescription: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.
SummonerSnowball.tooltip:
Throw a snowball a long distance, dealing {{ f1 }} true damage to the first enemy unit hit and granting True Sight of the target. If it hits an enemy, this ability can be recast for {{ e3 }} seconds to Dash to the tagged unit, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} true damage. Dashing to the target will reduce the cooldown of Mark by {{ e4 }}%.

Mark projectiles are not stopped by spell shields or projectile mitigation.
SummonerSnowball.sanitizedTooltip: Throw a snowball a long distance, dealing {{ f1 }} true damage to the first enemy unit hit and granting True Sight of the target. If it hits an enemy, this ability can be recast for {{ e3 }} seconds to Dash to the tagged unit, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} true damage. Dashing to the target will reduce the cooldown of Mark by {{ e4 }}%. Mark projectiles are not stopped by spell shields or projectile mitigation.

SummonerHeal.name: Heal
SummonerHeal.description: Restores 90-345 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Movement Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.
SummonerHeal.sanitizedDescription: Restores 90-345 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Movement Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.
SummonerHeal.tooltip:
Restores {{ f1 }} Health and grants 30% Movement Speed for 1 second to your champion and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.

If this spell cannot find a target, it will cast on the most wounded allied champion in range.
SummonerHeal.sanitizedTooltip: Restores {{ f1 }} Health and grants 30% Movement Speed for 1 second to your champion and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal. If this spell cannot find a target, it will cast on the most wounded allied champion in range.

SummonerMana.name: Clarity
SummonerMana.description: Restores 50% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 25% of their maximum Mana.
SummonerMana.sanitizedDescription: Restores 50% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 25% of their maximum Mana.
SummonerMana.tooltip: Restores {{ f1 }}% maximum Mana to your Champion and {{ f2 }}% to nearby allies.
SummonerMana.sanitizedTooltip: Restores {{ f1 }}% maximum Mana to your Champion and {{ f2 }}% to nearby allies.

SummonerPoroThrow.name: Poro Toss
SummonerPoroThrow.description: Toss a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.
SummonerPoroThrow.sanitizedDescription: Toss a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.
SummonerPoroThrow.tooltip:
Toss a Poro a long distance, dealing {{ f2 }} true damage to the first enemy unit hit, granting True Sight of the target.

This ability can be recast for 3 seconds if it hits an enemy to dash to the target hit, dealing {{ f2 }} more true damage and reducing the cooldown of the next Poro Toss by {{ e4 }} seconds.

Poros are not blocked by spell shields or wind walls because they are animals, not spells!

''Poros are a model for Runeterran aerodynamics.''
SummonerPoroThrow.sanitizedTooltip: Toss a Poro a long distance, dealing {{ f2 }} true damage to the first enemy unit hit, granting True Sight of the target. This ability can be recast for 3 seconds if it hits an enemy to dash to the target hit, dealing {{ f2 }} more true damage and reducing the cooldown of the next Poro Toss by {{ e4 }} seconds. Poros are not blocked by spell shields or wind walls because they are animals, not spells! ''Poros are a model for Runeterran aerodynamics.''

SummonerSmite.name: Smite
SummonerSmite.description: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target epic, large, or medium monster or enemy minion. Restores Health based on your maximum life when used against monsters.
SummonerSmite.sanitizedDescription: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target epic, large, or medium monster or enemy minion. Restores Health based on your maximum life when used against monsters.
SummonerSmite.tooltip:
Deals {{ f1 }} true damage to target epic, large, or medium monster or enemy minion. Against monsters, additionally restores {{ f6 }} (+{{ f7 }}) Health.

Smite regains a charge every {{ ammorechargetime }} seconds, up to a maximum of 2 charges.
SummonerSmite.sanitizedTooltip: Deals {{ f1 }} true damage to target epic, large, or medium monster or enemy minion. Against monsters, additionally restores {{ f6 }} (+{{ f7 }}) Health. Smite regains a charge every {{ ammorechargetime }} seconds, up to a maximum of 2 charges.

SummonerSiegeChampSelect1.name: Nexus Siege: Siege Weapon Slot
SummonerSiegeChampSelect1.description: In Nexus Siege, Summoner Spells are replaced with Siege Weapon Slots. Spend Crystal Shards to buy single-use Siege Weapons from the item shop, then use your Summoner Spell keys to activate them!
SummonerSiegeChampSelect1.sanitizedDescription: In Nexus Siege, Summoner Spells are replaced with Siege Weapon Slots. Spend Crystal Shards to buy single-use Siege Weapons from the item shop, then use your Summoner Spell keys to activate them!

SummonerSiegeChampSelect2.name: Nexus Siege: Siege Weapon Slot
SummonerSiegeChampSelect2.description: In Nexus Siege, Summoner Spells are replaced with Siege Weapon Slots. Spend Crystal Shards to buy single-use Siege Weapons from the item shop, then use your Summoner Spell keys to activate them!
SummonerSiegeChampSelect2.sanitizedDescription: In Nexus Siege, Summoner Spells are replaced with Siege Weapon Slots. Spend Crystal Shards to buy single-use Siege Weapons from the item shop, then use your Summoner Spell keys to activate them!

SummonerExhaust.name: Exhaust
SummonerExhaust.description: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed by 30%, and their damage dealt by 40% for 2.5 seconds.
SummonerExhaust.sanitizedDescription: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed by 30%, and their damage dealt by 40% for 2.5 seconds.
SummonerExhaust.tooltip: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed by {{ f3 }}%, and their damage dealt by {{ f2 }}% for 2.5 seconds.
SummonerExhaust.sanitizedTooltip: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Movement Speed by {{ f3 }}%, and their damage dealt by {{ f2 }}% for 2.5 seconds.

SummonerDot.name: Ignite
SummonerDot.description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.
SummonerDot.sanitizedDescription: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.
SummonerDot.tooltip:
Ignite deals {{ f1 }} true damage to target enemy champion over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target and applies Grievous Wounds for the duration.

(Grievous Wounds reduces healing effects by 40%. This vision does not reveal stealthed enemies.)
SummonerDot.sanitizedTooltip: Ignite deals {{ f1 }} true damage to target enemy champion over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target and applies Grievous Wounds for the duration. (Grievous Wounds reduces healing effects by 40%. This vision does not reveal stealthed enemies.)

SummonerHaste.name: Ghost
SummonerHaste.description: Your champion gains increased Movement Speed and can move through units for 10 seconds. Grants a maximum of 28-45% (depending on champion level) Movement Speed after accelerating for 2 seconds.
SummonerHaste.sanitizedDescription: Your champion gains increased Movement Speed and can move through units for 10 seconds. Grants a maximum of 28-45% (depending on champion level) Movement Speed after accelerating for 2 seconds.
SummonerHaste.tooltip: Your champion gains increased Movement Speed and can move through units for 10 seconds. Grants a maximum of {{ f1 }}% Movement Speed after accelerating for 2 seconds.
SummonerHaste.sanitizedTooltip: Your champion gains increased Movement Speed and can move through units for 10 seconds. Grants a maximum of {{ f1 }}% Movement Speed after accelerating for 2 seconds.
